docs.snippet: A resolution calling on all governments to impose an arms embargo against Communist China and North Korea was approved yesterday by the Political and Security Committee of the United Nations General Assembly despite Soviet claims that only the...
docs.lead_paragraph: A resolution calling on all governments to impose an arms embargo against Communist China and North Korea was approved yesterday by the Political and Security Committee of the United Nations General Assembly despite Soviet claims that only the Security Council had the right to take such action.
docs.abstract: embargo passed by Assembly Pol Com, 45-0, 9 abstentions, USSR bloc not participating; voting illus; Arab Gross (US), in s for ban, says resolution calls on sanctions com to continue studying other measures against China; Sir B Rau (India), abstaining, says ban adds to difficulties of hon war settlement; Deputy Min Malik (USSR) says UN Charter forbids Assembly to move on questions before Security Council

headline.main: VOTING FOR U.N. ARMS EMBARGO ON RED CHINA; RED CHINA EMBARGO VOTED, 45-0, IN U.N.
SHIPPING--MAILS; ALL HOURS GIVEN IN DAYLIGHT SAVING TIME

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, May 19 (AP)--The Harlem Globetrotters opened their basketball series here today with a 47-33 triumph over the Penarol Club.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, May 19 (AP)--The Harlem Globetrotters opened their basketball series here today with a 47-33 triumph over the Penarol Club.

docs.snippet: THE eight different designs to be used for the fifteen  stamps which the United Nations will issue were announced last week. Six of the approved vignettes will be used for the eleven stamps prepared for normal postage, and the other two will appear...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE eight different designs to be used for the fifteen stamps which the United Nations will issue were announced last week. Six of the approved vignettes will be used for the eleven stamps prepared for normal postage, and the other two will appear on the four air-mail stamps.
